name: Rarible protocol
description: Simplifying the go-to-market process for NFT projects and ideas. *This is an example project. The scores below are not accurate. Feel free to jump in on Github to make this quest a reality.

tasks.name: Create a Web3 wallet
tasks.description: Visit https://ethereum.org/wallets and install a wallet to start your journey.

tasks.name: $RARI token
tasks.description: Buy and hold any amount of $RARI tokens in your wallet.

tasks.name: Create collectible(s)
tasks.description: Create any collectible(s) on the Rarible platform https://rarible.com/create

tasks.name: Sold any collectible(s)
tasks.description: Sell any created collectible(s) on the Rarible platform.

tasks.name: Buy collectible(s)
tasks.description: Buy any amount of collectible(s) on the Rarible platform https://rarible.com/

tasks.name: Rarible OG
tasks.description: Extra points if you've bought any collectible(s) more than 1 year ago
